Subjects: Virgin Mary, hymns to; hymns, to Virgin Mary
_description: John Lydgate, ‘Ave regina celorum’ — six 8-line stanzas (ababbcbc) with this refrain

CamTCC601.First Lines:
hayle lumynary and benigne lanterneOf Ierusalem the holy ordres
                    nyne…
CamTCC601.Last Lines:
…Where more ioy ys then tung may tellAue regina
                    celorum

BLHar2251.First Lines:
HAile luminary and benyng lanterneOf Ierusalem the holy orders
                    nyne…
BLHar2251.Last Lines:
…To blisse above that we al may comeWhere more Ioy is than
                    tunge may telleAve regina celorum
